description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.sobLlAGQkmWcFBFx]{Magic Hack}

As a standard action, you can spend 1 RP to temporarily suppress magic, as if using @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.KQ4vSfG9tq8EJxir]{Dispel Magic}. Choose either an ongoing spell or a magic item within 30 feet of you. The magical effects of the spell or magic item are suppressed for 1d4 rounds, and then they return. If the spell’s level is higher than you can cast or the item’s level is greater than your level, you can’t suppress it. If you target a spell affecting a creature, the creature can attempt a Will save to stop you from suppressing the spell.
